name: Special Duty Assignment Pay
description: Pay for specific skill identifiers or duty assignments. Amount varies by assignment ($150-$450/month typical range).

name: Imminent Danger or Hostile Fire Pay
description: Statutory $225/month for service in designated hostile fire or imminent danger zones.

name: Family Separation Allowance
description: Statutory $250/month when separated from family members due to military orders for 30+ days.

name: Foreign Language Proficiency Pay
description: Pay for qualified foreign language skills. Amount varies by proficiency level and language criticality ($100-$500/month).

name: Sea Pay
description: Career Sea Pay for Navy/Coast Guard personnel. Requires rate table lookup by paygrade and cumulative sea duty months. Implementation deferred to v2.

name: Flight Pay
description: Aviation Career Incentive Pay (ACIP) for rated aviators. Requires rate table lookup by years of aviation service and aviation category. Implementation deferred to v2.

name: Submarine Pay
description: Submarine Duty Pay for qualified submariners. Requires rate table lookup by paygrade and submarine qualification level. Implementation deferred to v2.

name: Dive Pay
description: Diving Duty Pay for qualified divers. Requires rate table lookup by paygrade and dive qualification level. Implementation deferred to v2.

name: Parachute Pay
description: Parachute Duty Pay for airborne-qualified personnel. Typically $150-$225/month based on jump status. Implementation deferred to v2.

name: Hardship Duty Pay
description: Location-based hardship pay. Amount varies by duty location hardship level ($50-$150/month typical range).
